Message:
Huh? Leader Lucille...
what did you just...

“Humans should live with humans,
and witches with witches.

Now come—let’s save witches
from the clutches of those humans
once and for all!”

With those words,
Leader Lucille wasn’t just
my leader anymore.
She became everyone’s—

But, Nebra opposed Leader Lucille
until the bitter end,
when their fighting finally led
them to cut ties completely...

I just couldn’t help but
feel like I was the one
who tore them apart...

I still can’t forget the loneliness
in Nebra’s eyes that day...

Years have passed since then,
but the sight only continues to
cast a shadow over my heart.

Leader Lucille also bears
a dark expression on her face
more often than not...

I know I can never be
a replacement for Nebra.
But...
